channel.title: CPU choice
channel.description:
Is there a huge considerable advantage to getting the i7-960 over the i7-930? I'd like more than anything to get the former, but it's a bit out of my price range.
I'm also using my comp as an MC server, so I'm guessing the 960 might be necessary. =/

item.title: CPU choice
item.dc:creator: Dreadmoth
item.description:
Performance-wise, I don’t think the extra cost for the i7 960 compared to the 930 is justified. You’d be better off spending that money on some other components (probably RAM if you’re running a server), or getting a better cooler and overclocking the 930.

Read full topic

item.title: CPU choice
item.dc:creator: Winged_One
item.description:
That’s not a choice I have. I gave you my two choices. Is the 960 really worth going over my budget?

Read full topic

item.title: CPU choice
item.dc:creator: Luciel
item.description:
If you havent already got the motherboard…

THEN NEITHER!

go for the new second gen socket 1155 sandy bridge intel cpus

i5 2500k or i6 2600k

; )
